tier.item: John-NOM Mary with Kobe to go-PAST (Japanese; Kuno, 1973, p. 5)

b. Taro-ga Hiro-ga Hanako-ni syasin-o mise-ta to
Taro-NOM Hiro-NOM Hanako-to picture-ACC show-PAST that
`Taro is thinking that Hiro showed the picture to Hanako.'

Ozo say that he will put photo in the box.

(11) a. Jon-ek Miren-i egon-gelan liburu-a irakur-ri.
`John read the book to Mary in living room.' (Basque)

John read the book to Mary in living room.

not eat the cake. (not *John not ate the cake.)

went I with Mary to-the cinema
